article_title: Here's The Real Reason Markets Are Diving

article_metadata.description: Stocks are falling because of brewing troubles in emerging markets. And those troubles are the result of economic ignorance: too many central bankers don't know how to defend their currencies, which are under attack. If they don't get their act together, we could have another big financial crisis like that [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes
